languages.text: Подозревая, кому может принадлежать найденный корабль, Хейнрикс просит поговорить с разведчиками.

traits.locale_text: Подозревая, кому может принадлежать найденный корабль, Хейнрикс просит поговорить с разведчиками.

languages.text: Heinrix has a suspicion regarding the previous owners of the vessel, so he asks to speak with the scouts.
languages.original_text: Подозревая, кому может принадлежать найденный корабль, Хейнрикс просит поговорить с разведчиками.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix has a suspicion about who the vessel has belonged to before, so he asks to speak with the scouts.

languages.text: 海因里希似乎猜测出了这艘舰船前任主人的身份，要求与探索队员亲自谈谈。
languages.original_text: Heinrix has a suspicion regarding the previous owners of the vessel, so he asks to speak with the scouts.

traits.locale_text: 海因里希似乎猜测出了这艘舰船前任主人的身份，要求与探索队员亲自谈谈。

languages.text: ハインリックスはこの船の前の持ち主に疑念を抱き、偵察兵に話を聞くよう依頼する。
languages.original_text: Heinrix has a suspicion regarding the previous owners of the vessel, so he asks to speak with the scouts.

traits.locale_text: ハインリックスはこの船の前の持ち主に疑念を抱き、偵察兵に話を聞くよう依頼する。

languages.text: Heinrix tiene sospechas sobre los anteriores propietarios de la nave, por lo que pide hablar con los exploradores.
languages.original_text: Heinrix has a suspicion regarding the previous owners of the vessel, so he asks to speak with the scouts.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix tiene sospechas sobre los anteriores propietarios de la nave, por lo que pide hablar con los exploradores.

languages.text: Heinrix hat einen Verdacht, was die Identität der früheren Besitzer des Schiffs angeht. Er bittet darum, mit den Spähern sprechen zu dürfen.
languages.original_text: Heinrix has a suspicion regarding the previous owners of the vessel, so he asks to speak with the scouts.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix hat einen Verdacht, was die Identität der früheren Besitzer des Schiffs angeht. Er bittet darum, mit den Spähern sprechen zu dürfen.

languages.text: Heinrix a une petite idée de l'identité des précédents propriétaires du vaisseau et demande à parler aux éclaireurs.
languages.original_text: Heinrix has a suspicion regarding the previous owners of the vessel, so he asks to speak with the scouts.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix a une petite idée de l'identité des précédents propriétaires du vaisseau et demande à parler aux éclaireurs.

languages.text: Geminin önceki sahipleriyle ilgili birtakım şüpheleri olan Heinrix, keşif erleriyle konuşmak istiyor.
languages.original_text: Heinrix has a suspicion regarding the previous owners of the vessel, so he asks to speak with the scouts.
